            select: {
              id: true,
              name: true,
              image: true
            }
          },
          owner: {
            select: {
              id: true,
              name: true,
              image: true
            }
          }
        }
      })

Please either use `include` or `select`, but not both at the same time.

            }

            }

            ~~~~~~~

                  id: true,

              image: true
            }
          }
        }
      })

ÔåÆ 350 const tasks = await this.prisma.task.findMany({
        where: {
          isDeleted: false,
          OR: [
            {
              ownerId: "c45e24b2-bfa8-4295-875e-e12547b410ad"
            },
            {
              assigneeId: "c45e24b2-bfa8-4295-875e-e12547b410ad"
            },
            {
              project: {
                workspace: {
                  members: {
                    some: {
                      userId: "c45e24b2-bfa8-4295-875e-e12547b410ad",
                      workspace: {
                        isDeleted: false
                      }
                    }
                  }
                }
              }
            }
          ]
        },
        include: {
          subTasks: true,
          recurrence: true,
          tags: {
            include: {
              tag: true
            }
          },
          project: {
            include: {
            ~~~~~~~
              workspace: {
                select: {
                  id: true,
                  name: true
                }
              }
            },
            select: {
            ~~~~~~
              id: true,
              name: true,
              color: true
            }
          },
          assignee: {
            select: {
              id: true,
              name: true,
              image: true
            }
          },
          owner: {
            select: {
              id: true,
              name: true,
              image: true
            }
          }
        }
      })

Please either use `include` or `select`, but not both at the same time.

            },
            select: {
            ~~~~~~
              id: true,
              name: true,
              color: true
            }
          },
          assignee: {
            select: {
              id: true,
              name: true,
              image: true
            }
          },
          owner: {
            select: {
              id: true,
              name: true,
              image: true
            }
          }
        }
      })

                  members: {
                    some: {
                      userId: "c45e24b2-bfa8-4295-875e-e12547b410ad",

                        isDeleted: false
                      }
                    }
                  }
                }
              }
            }
          ]
        },
        include: {
          subTasks: true,
          recurrence: true,
          tags: {
            include: {
              tag: true
            }
          },

            include: {
            ~~~~~~~
              workspace: {
                select: {
                  id: true,
                  name: true
                }
              }

            ~~~~~~

              name: true,
              color: true

              id: true,
              name: true,
              image: true
            }
          },
          owner: {
            select: {
              id: true,
              name: true,
              image: true
            }
          }
        }
      })

Please either use `include` or `select`, but not both at the same time.
